div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%
div.p: Tag: All (Details: DSF Read Access Tag code ALL = 'All')
This case-sensitive code system http://dsf.dev/fhir/CodeSystem/read-access-tag defines the following codes in a Grouped By hierarchy:

tr.td: Read access for organization specified via extension http://dsf.dev/fhir/StructureDefinition/extension-read-access-organization
Read access for member organizations with role in consortium (parent organization) specified via extension http://dsf.dev/fhir/StructureDefinition/extension-read-access-consortium-role
Read access for remote and local users

definition.value: Read access for organization specified via extension http://dsf.dev/fhir/StructureDefinition/extension-read-access-organization
Read access for member organizations with role in consortium (parent organization) specified via extension http://dsf.dev/fhir/StructureDefinition/extension-read-access-consortium-role
Read access for remote and local users
